title: Chat agreement
content:
The chat agreement interface is a modal sub-interface that is displayed to players when they attempt to adjust either the "Which nearby players can you chat with?" or "Who can you 'direct message' with?" settings through the privacy settings interface.

It contains links to the game rules and privacy notice interfaces and information about the chat. Players must agree to the interface before they are allowed to change the settings. It doesn't appear again once it's been agreed with.
